__e: I'm in trouble... and I need you to help me.
Listen, Will, if Smith's in some kind of trouble... it's a sure thing that he caused the trouble and he's not on the receiving end.
He's looking for trouble and he's got a nose for it.
We can't afford any more trouble on account of you.
It seems to me that you've already got some trouble here.
You're going to get me into a lot of trouble for this.
I got a personal letter from Lee Iacocca.
That's because you always make such a stupid fuss about things.
Now I know why you took me off the hook with the police.
